name: Emergen-C Immune + System Support with Vitamin D Blueberry-Acai Drink Mix Dietary Supplement, 0.3 oz, 30 count

reviews.name: Emergen-C Immune + System Support with Vitamin D Blueberry-Acai Drink Mix Dietary Supplement, 0.3 oz, 30 count
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my kids who lives in Berlin and took these with me while visiting them currently. My only disappointment is that it is not readily available at any of the stores close by where I live. It would have been a lot easier and would cost me less without having to pay for shipping.
reviews.title: 13 December 2012

reviews.name: Emergen-C Immune + System Support with Vitamin D Blueberry-Acai Drink Mix Dietary Supplement, 0.3 oz, 30 count
reviews.reviewText: I got Emergen-C Immune samples from Smiley 360, great tasting, instant energy boost, available in many variants and my flu like symptoms went away. Easy to mix with water, curbed thirst and gave an instant energy boost. The flavor lingers on in mouth.
reviews.title: Great

reviews.name: Emergen-C Immune + System Support with Vitamin D Blueberry-Acai Drink Mix Dietary Supplement, 0.3 oz, 30 count
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing to keep your immune system up, specially in those times were colds and flu are around. From all the other flavors, this is my favorite for drinking.
reviews.title: Good product, better taste

reviews.name: Emergen-C Immune + System Support with Vitamin D Blueberry-Acai Drink Mix Dietary Supplement, 0.3 oz, 30 count
reviews.reviewText:
Hello everyone!!!,

I'm an agent for Smiley360!! I receive products for free from them to try and share my opinion/review about. I have just received in the mail my first ever mission for them and I'm really excited!! Thanks to Smiley360, I get to try Emergen-C for my first mission & I have to say I do like it a lot. I love that they have so many delicious flavors to choose from. They also make special blends for kids, immune system, and low calorie!! I have already referred this products to many of my friends and family, of which all seemed pretty excited to try it. I love that it helps increase your energy naturally and it's good to drink before working out so you can be nice and energized to workout, there are so many reasons to try this product, that I could sit here all day and type about it but then people probably wouldn't read it because they don't feel like reading a book. :) So I will end my review with this!!! >>> I totally recommend this product and to get more information or even free samples you can go to their site. & you can also join Smiley360 for free so you too can start receiving free products to try and write reviews about you will not be disappointed, it's so much fun!!!

Thank you for reading. :)
reviews.title: Emergen-C!!!
